scripts.deploy: npm run gh-pages-build && npm run gh-pages-push && npm run gh-pages-cleanup
scripts.gh-pages-build: git checkout -b gh-pages && npm run build && git add -f dist && git commit -m "Deploy to gh-pages"
scripts.gh-pages-push: git push origin --delete gh-pages && git subtree push --prefix dist origin gh-pages
scripts.gh-pages-cleanup: git checkout master && git branch -D gh-pages
